Class GenericURI

java.lang.Object
  |

All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Serializable, URI
Direct Known Subclasses:
SipUri, TelURLImpl
public class GenericURI
extends NetObject
implements URI

Implementation of the URI class. This relies on the 1.4 URI class.

Author:
M. Ranganathan
This code is in the public domain.
